To install the Android PlaceBooks App you need to:
Connect your android phone to your computer and mount the SD card.
Download Placebooks.apk and copy it to your phone's SD card.
Unmount the SD card from the computer.
On the phone, go to the Android Market and install an app called 'App Installer'
Open App Installer and install PlaceBooks.apk from the SD card (you may have to check 'allow apps to be installed from sd card' in your settings)
Open the PlaceBooks app and you're off
